 (multipart/related)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
  
 
  
 
  
 
12/01/2006 
 
  
 
7155 5474 4100 4346 4730 
 
  
 
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL 
 
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
  
 
Designated Agent 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
 
George Poletes 
 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 
 
Dallas, TX 75207 
 
  
 
Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property  
 
  
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
  
 
This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c) (3) (A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Onkyo USA Corporation ("Onkyo") (such
copyrighted material is referred to as "Onkyo Works" or "Onkyo IP")) by your client,
powersellernyc.com, at the URL powersellernyc.com.  Onkyo has a good faith belief
that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by Onkyo, its
agents, or the law.  The information contained in this letter is accurate, and under
the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Onkyo. 
 
  
 
The specific works, graphics or other material Onkyo believes to be infringed or to
be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted
images from Onkyo's website.  Specific violations of copyrighted images by
powersellernyc.com are listed below this paragraph. 
 
  
 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-7379--Onkyo-TX-NR901-THX-Select-7-1-Channel-Digital-Surround-Receiver-.html

 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-7402--Onkyo-TX-NR801-THX-Select-7-1-Channel-Digital-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html

 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16311--Onkyo-TX-SR703-THX-Select2-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html

 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-18600--Onkyo-Onkyo-TXSR604B-Receiver-.html 
 
  
 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16310--Onkyo-TX-SR603X-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html

 
  
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) (1) (C), Onkyo hereby
demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this case.  Calls directly to Onkyo will not be accepted.  The
Infringer has been notified of the infringement.  If you and the Infringer do not
respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 12/13/2006 , we will assume that
the matters described above are true and will advise Onkyo to proceed accordingly. 
 
  
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
VCLM Law 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc  
 
 
 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
Barbara Davis 
 
LMS Manager 
 
Net Enforcers Inc. 
 
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com  
 
  
 
The Online Enforcement Specialists...... 
 
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
